document.full_text: classified u.s. military documents released by wikileaks that give intelligence assessments of guantanamo prisoners will not affect any of their cases, attorney general eric holder said on tuesday.
document.title: leaked guantanamo files not seen hurting u.s. cases
lines_and_colors: classified u.s. military documents released by wikileaks that give intelligence assessments of guantanamo prisoners will not affect any of their cases, attorney general eric holder said on tuesday.
